settings.title: Visit us
settings.text: A boutique caf√© is a place where you will be prepared and served a product in its original form, revealing the correct understanding of its taste.

settings.hero_subtitle: We fantasise about flavour. We're passionate about purpose. And we have a constant, insatiable craving for curiosity that's fuelled by our restless appetite for adventure and authenticity. When we're not creating delicious new sensory combinations, we spend our days scouting the world. Seeking out exhilarating new tastes and textures to help connect with the iconic cultural flavours we believe are just done better, when they're done right. We hope you love them as much as we do.
settings.flavours_intro: However you look at it, life is made up of flavours. Sweet, sour, salty, bitter and savoury. Or umami as our Japanese friends like to call it. We believe that by embracing the Japanese way of thinking we're able to create mochi that brings together all of life's flavours to create a world where delicious is more than just a dream. It's a portal to other cultures. Yuum. It's a life full of flavour.
settings.flavours_guide: When looking at the products, you will know what flavours you are about to experience by recognising the flavour shape that is associated with each of them. Use this as a guide to make your picks or feel free try something new if you are feeling adventurous!
settings.sweet_explore_text: Explore the wealth of unique flavors at Yuum
settings.seasonal_intro: Text about Seasonality - how life around us changes with the seasons (foliage / sun / blossom / moods / cold) and how this also changes the world of our cafe.
